sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些连接副词均有"因此，所以"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: accordingly, consequently, hence, so, therefore, thus
means: accordingly ：书面用词，强调根据某种原因而得出的结果，其前可用冒号或分号，但不用逗号。
consequently ：正式用词，侧重符合逻辑的结果。
hence ：较正式用词，指接下来的东西是理所当然的必需的东西，但强调其重要性。
so ：用于比较随便的场合，口语中多用。
therefore ：通常指引出一个推断出的必然结论。
thus ：多用于书面语中，可与therefore换用。

sentence.Network_en: The truth is that junk bonds were misnamed, and therefore misunderstood.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上人们对垃圾债券的称谓有误，所以产生了误解。

sentence.Network_en: They had seen him trawling and therefore knew that there were fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们曾见过他用拖网捕鱼，因此知道那里有鱼。

sentence.Network_en: Men are anxious to improve their circumstances, but are unwilling to improve themselves; they therefore remain bound.--James Allen
sentence.Network_cn: 人们总是渴望改善周遭环境，但是却不愿意改善自己，因此总停留在原地，无法进步。

therefore God , Your God , has anointed You with the oil of exultant joy above Your partners " ; "所以神，就是你的神，用欢乐的油膏你，胜过膏你的同伙。
英文合同的翻译-法律英语-法律教育网 ... remedy： 补救方法 Now Therefore： 据此 the consideration： 对价。对价是对一项允诺.

entry.def: You use therefore to introduce a logical result or conclusion.

example.ex: Muscle cells need lots of fuel and therefore burn lots of calories...
example.tran: 肌肉细胞需要很多能量，所以会燃烧大量卡路里。

example.ex: Nothing was to prevent him now from becoming the richest, and therefore the happiest, man in the world.
example.tran: 现在什么也阻挡不了他成为世上最富有因而也是最幸福的人。

means.word_mean: 1. (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result;

sentences.sentence: "the eggs were fresh and hence satisfactory"
"it is late and thus we must go"
"the witness is biased and so cannot be trusted"
"he had good reason to be grateful for the opportunities which they had made available to him and which consequently led to the good position he now held"

Sentence.sentence: Many policy measures to control obesity（肥胖症）assume that people consciously and rationally choose what and how much they eat and therefore focus on providing information and more access to healthier foods," note the two researchers.
But technology has reduced transaction costs, making sharing assets cheaper and easier than ever—and therefore possible on a much larger scale.
Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.
Its informal conversational style would make interaction comfortable, and yet the machine would remain slightly unpredictable and therefore interesting.

means.word_mean: 因此, 为此, 所以

sentences.en: They therefore can do nothing good of themselves.
sentences.cn: 所以他们靠自己是什么好事也做不成的。

jushi.english: The sentence can, therefore, be expected to be severe.
jushi.chinese: 因此,完全可以预料,判决将是严厉的。

jushi.english: They therefore can do nothing good of themselves.
jushi.chinese: 所以他们靠自己是什么好事也做不成的。
